trans-unit.source: Represents an immutable (read-only) pair of "Name" and "Description" strings.
trans-unit.target: "Name" 및 "설명" 문자열의 변경할 수 없는 (읽기 전용) 쌍을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: LocalizedNameDescriptionPair is a basic building block for structures that express locale specific information for an <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.
trans-unit.target: LocalizedNameDescriptionPair은 로캘 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense>.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.UnsignedPublishLicense> 에 대 한 특정 정보를 표현 하는 구조에 대 한 기본 구성 요소

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref> class.
The value for the locale <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> property.
The value for the locale <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> property.
Either the name parameter or description parameter is .
trans-unit.target: Either the name parameter or description parameter is .

trans-unit.source: The Description property is set as a parameter to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Description 속성에 대 한 매개 변수로 설정 되어는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> properties of a given object match those of this <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 나타냅니다 여부는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *>이 지정된 된 개체의 속성 일치 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> properties of.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> properties of the given object match those of this instance; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>경우는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *>이 인스턴스와 지정된 된 개체의 속성 일치, 그렇지 않으면 <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a computed hash code based on the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> properties.
trans-unit.target: 에 따라 계산 된 해시 코드를 가져옵니다는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 속성.

trans-unit.source: A computed hash code based on the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Name*> and <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.Description*> properties of this <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기반으로 계산 된 해시 코드는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 속성이 <xref href="System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Name property is set as a parameter to the <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Name 속성에 대 한 매개 변수로 설정 됩니다는 <xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A>생성자.</xref:System.Security.RightsManagement.LocalizedNameDescriptionPair.%23ctor%2A>
